title: The William S. Burroughs Collection of Bradley P. Allen
description: An evolving experiment in the application of linked data principles to descriptive bibliography.

items.title: Items in the Collection
items.sql: select item.id as id, [dc:title] as title, originDate as date, note.value as description from Item left join Item_note on Item.id = Item_note.subject left join Note on Note.id = Item_note.object order by date, id
